alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 5:01AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson Davis, southeastern Evangeline, northwestern Acadia and northwestern St. Landry Parishes through 530 AM CST... At 501 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Basile, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eunice, Ville Platte, Mamou, Basile, Chataignier, Bayou Chicot, Indian Lake, Chicot State Park, Duralde, Pine Island, Whiteville, Reddell, Grand Prairie, St. Landry and Hathaway. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 32 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis; St. Landry
